raw_text:
McCririck out of Big Brother show
 
 Racing pundit John McCririck has become the latest contestant to be evicted from Celebrity Big Brother.
 
 He was nominated to leave the Channel 4 show by fellow housemates, alongside Happy Mondays dancer Bez. At one time Bez was among the most popular contestants but he has since become withdrawn and argumentative. McCririck was ordered to leave the house on Monday, following Jackie Stallone, the actor Sylvester's mother, who was first to be evicted. Bez reacted badly to the news that he had been nominated by five of his fellow housemates, whilst John received four votes against him. Sylvester Stallone's ex-wife Brigitte Nielsen nominated both John and Bez. She said: "Bez is a difficult human being. There's something wrong with him. Even though he's making an effort, he's not very happy in here." Former Holby City actor Jeremy Edwards said he had nominated Bez after he became agitated on Friday night and talked about escaping over the wall to go clubbing. He said Bez was being "loopy" and "stressed". According to bookmaker Ladbrokes, John McCririck was 1/3 favourite to be evicted on Monday while Bez was at 9/4 . McCririck faced the public vote on Friday and received 67% of the vote to keep him in the house, whilst Jackie Stallone was evicted.
llama3.2:1b: John McCririck has been evicted from Celebrity Big Brother after receiving 67% of the vote. He was nominated by fellow housemates including Bez, who received four votes against him, and his reaction led to Jackie Stallone's eviction as her mother.
llama3.2:3b: John McCririck has been evicted from Celebrity Big Brother after fellow housemate Bez and others nominated him for eviction alongside Jacky Stallone who had already left.
gemma2:2b: John McCririck was evicted from Celebrity Big Brother after being nominated by fellow housemates.  He received four votes against him while Bez received five.  Sylvester Stallone's ex-wife Brigitte Nielsen and former actor Jeremy Edwards nominated Bez. McCririck faced a public vote which saw him keep in the house with 67% of the vote.

McCrisick received four votes against him, while Bez faced public vote reaction for his difficult behavior. McCrisick was 1/3 favorite to be evicted based on Ladbrokes odds.
opencoder:1.5b: McCririck out of Big Brother show has been a contestant for John McCririck who has since left Celebrity Big Brother. He was nominated by five friends but has been withdrawn due to argumentative behaviour and was ordered to leave the house on Monday following Jack Stallone's mother, who is now inevitable eviction from his previous life. Bez reacted badly to the news that he had been nominated by four contestants including John, Sylvester Stallone, Brigitte Nielsen, and Jeremy Edwards. She said: "Bez is a difficult human being." The former Holby City actor Jeremy Edwards later mentioned that he was evicted after he became agitated on Friday night and discussed escaping over the wall to go clubbing. He expressed confusion and "loopy" "stressed".
smollm:1.7b: McCririck out of Big Brother show

tinyllama:1.1b: McCricippp, also known as Big Brother's latest contestant, has become the latest housemate to be voted out of the Channel 4 show after being nominated by fellow contestants for eviction. John McCririck, who was initially among the most popular candidates, was reportedly the target of votes from actress Sylvestre Stallone and ex-husband Bez, who each received four against him. Despite receiving support from Jackie Staullone, a former beauty queen, on Friday, McCririck faced the public vote on Monday and received 67% of the vote to remain in the house. The bookmaker Ladbrokes had previously listed John McCrirrick as the favourite to be evicted, but according to their latest odds on Monday, he was at 1/3 as a possible winner.
tinydolphin:1.1b: The summary: Former celebrity racing pundit John McCririck has been evicted from Big Brother amid a struggle for votes between himself and Sylvester Stallone's mother, Jackie Stallone. Both contestants received four votes each against one another but Bez, who was nominated for eviction with Jackie Stallone, had a negative experience with the process and was eventually voted out of the house on Monday.

granite3.1-dense:2b: John McCririck, a racing pundit, has been evicted from Celebrity Big Brother following nominations by fellow contestants. Bez, Happy Mondays dancer, was also nominated alongside McCririck and was the second to be evicted. Their popularity waned; Bez became withdrawn and argumentative, while McCririck received four votes against him from five housemates. Sylvester Stallone's ex-wife Brigitte Nielsen nominated both, citing Bez as a "difficult human being." Jeremy Edwards cited Bez's agitation and talk of escaping to go clubbing as reasons for his nomination. Despite Bez's popularity initially, McCririck won the public vote with 67%, keeping him in the house until Friday when he was evicted.
